name: xom_v2.api
description: Docker Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin Backups for XOm_v2.api [php:7.4.19-fpm]

scripts._create_folders: bash -c " cd system ; mkdir certs ; mkdir certs-data ; mkdir logs ; cd .. ; mkdir  mysql ; cp -r SOURCE PUBLIC ; cp 'system/build/buildAPI.sh' 'PUBLIC/' " ;
scripts._build: bash -c " npm run _install ; npm run _create_folders ; npm run _build_containers ; bash ./system/build/waiting_build_finish.sh ; docker restart DemoName_xom ; sleep 10 ; open-cli 'http://localhost:404/_.V._Installer/index.php' ;  echo 'DONE BUILD'"
scripts._O_: bash -c " npm run ysc_ ; npm run b__ "
